snippet.title: Sonny - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
When he wakes up aboard a ship under siege by monstrous undead, Sonny doesn't know who he is or what's going on... much less why he appears to be a zombie himself. Players who relish strategy will find Sonny's turn-based RPG combat a treat. To win you'll need to figure out how to use Sonny's many skills to their best advantage. 

Unlock and evolve new abilities that can be swapped in or out, grow your party with powerful, unique characters to handle any situation, and go up against seemingly unstoppable bizarre beasts. The wildly popular Flash RPG series with more than 35,000,000 combined plays on Armor Games alone comes to iPhone and iPad with a great new look and revamped mechanics.
